Title: Dogville
Actors: Nicole Kidman, Harriet Andersson, Lauren Bacall, Jean-Marc Barr
Plot: A woman on the run from the mob is reluctantly accepted in a small Colorado community in exchange for labor, but when a search visits the town she finds out that their support has a price.
Country: Denmark, Netherlands, Sweden, Germany, UK, France, Finland, Norway, Italy
Production: Zentropa Entertainments, Canal Plus Image International, Alan Young Pictures, 4 1/2
